code: import React from"react";import shoes from"@/components/CharacterOptions/shoes";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";var shoeLayers=shoes.map(function(shoe,i){return{name:"shoe-".concat(i+1),component:shoe.layer};});var ShoeLayer=function ShoeLayer(){var _useSelector=useSelector(function(store){return store.character;}),_useSelector$shoes=_useSelector.shoes,selectedShoes=_useSelector$shoes===void 0?"":_useSelector$shoes;var getShoeByName=function getShoeByName(name){return shoeLayers.filter(function(shoe){return shoe&&shoe.name===name;})[0];};var getLayer=function getLayer(active){var shoe=getShoeByName(active);return shoe?shoe.component():null;};return React.createElement("g",{id:"character-shoes"},getLayer(selectedShoes));};export default ShoeLayer;
